arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic chief's one-word explanation for chalk-and-cheese halves against Fulham
arts.sum: Shaun Maloney had one simple word for why Wigan Athletic came out a completely different side for the second half against Fulham - and pushed their Premier League opponents all the way before bowing out of the FA Cup in agonising fashion: 'Belief'.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic secure services of wing wizard to new contract
arts.sum: Jonny Smith insists he 'feels like home' at Wigan Athletic after signing a contract extension until the summer of 2027.

arts.ttl: Silva backs Muniz after Fulham’s cup win
arts.sum: Marco Silva praised Rodrigo Muniz after the striker took his chance to impress in Fulham’s FA Cup tie at Wigan. Muniz scored both the Whites’ goals as they won 2-1 to progress to the fifth round. Muniz has had to compete for a place with the more experienced Raul Jimenez, but has shown plenty of […] The post Silva backs Muniz after Fulham’s cup win appeared first on West London Sport.

arts.ttl: Fulham 2-1 Wigan (8 de Feb., 2025) Resultado Final

arts.ttl: Paul Kendrick's player ratings - Wigan Athletic v Fulham - ‘...did not look out of place against Premier League opposition...'
arts.sum: Paul Kendrick runs the rule over the Wigan Athletic side that pushed Premier League Fulham all the way in the FA Cup at the Brick Community Stadium and delivers his report card.

arts.ttl: Fulham boss Marco Silva praises Rodrigo Muniz after brace in win at Wigan
arts.sum: The Cottagers held on against the spirited Latics and progressed thanks to a 2-1 win.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic give Fulham the fright of their life in the FA Cup
arts.sum: Wigan Athletic threw everything including the kitchen sink at Premier League Fulham in an enthralling FA Cup fourth-round tie, only to bow out by the odd goal in three – after seeing a stoppage-time ‘equaliser’ agonisingly chalked off.

arts.ttl: Rodrigo Muniz double sees Fulham secure win at Wigan
arts.sum: Jonny Smith had drawn the League One side level.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic v Fulham - Maloney rings the changes
arts.sum: Shaun Maloney has made three changes to his Wigan Athletic for Saturday’s FA Cup fourth-round tie against Premier League Fulham.

arts.ttl: Fulham stars surprise club's Community Captain with award
arts.sum: Barker is one of more than 100 people across England and Wales being celebrated through More than a game initiative as a Community Captain, someone at the heart of the club's Premier League-funded programmes who deserves recognition for their contribution to the game and society. Fast-forward to 2025 and Barker is now a coach and mentor for the Foundation in the same Premier League Kicks programme that helped to nurture her.
